enjug.erijan.games.yatzy.control

Class RollBehaviorMaxiYatzy

  • java.lang.Object
    • enjug.erijan.games.yatzy.control.RollBehaviorMaxiYatzy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RollBehavior

    public class RollBehaviorMaxiYatzy
extends java.lang.Object
implements RollBehavior
    Maxi Yatzy rolling. Uses six dice and the possibility to save rolls. Fixme: the bahavior is buggy. Created by Jan Eriksson on 16/11/15.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      Constructor, set local references to game state and dice models.

    • Constructor Detail

      • RollBehaviorMaxiYatzy

        public RollBehaviorMaxiYatzy(GameState gameState,
                             DiceHandler diceHandler)
        Constructor, set local references to game state and dice models. Initiates a hashmap for the saved rolls, one entry per player.
        Parameters:
        gameState - Reference to a model for game state.
        diceHandler - Reference to a model for the dice.

    • Method Detail

      • rollActiveDice

        public void rollActiveDice()
        Roll active dice for active player. First take any saved rolls from hashmap and add to temporary max number of rolls. After first roll scoring as allowed by setting that property on game state model to false. After last roll all dice are deactivated and rolling is disallowed by setting a property on state model to false.
        Specified by:
        rollActiveDice in interface RollBehavior

      • resetDice

        public void resetDice()
        Save rolls and setup dice for next player.
        Specified by:
        resetDice in interface RollBehavior

      • toggleActiveDie

        public void toggleActiveDie(GameDie die)
        No holding of dice allowed until at least one roll.
        Specified by:
        toggleActiveDie in interface RollBehavior
        Parameters:
        die - Specific die to activate/deactivate.
